doc.field: 73rd Regiment of the New York State Volunteers records
73rd Regiment of the New York State Volunteers records
Series IV: Miscellaneous documents and correspondence
Series IV: Miscellaneous documents and correspondence

The Miscellaneous Documents and Correspondence series includes documents and correspondence related to the 73rd Regiment. The majority of the correspondence is by or to Michael W. Burns. Assorted documents include a stock certificate for M.W. Burns, a copy of an address by Gen. Sickles, a mock proclamation, and a program for a show by The Libby Prison Minstrels.
